description:
This market refers to the NHL Regular Season Matchup between the Vegas Golden Knights and the Colorado Avalanche scheduled for October 9, 2024, 10:00 PM ET.

If the Vegas Golden Knights win, the market will resolve to “Golden Knights”.

If the Colorado Avalanche win, the market will resolve to “Avalanche”.

This market will resolve based on the winner of the game, which includes regular time, overtime, and penalties. If the game is cancelled or postponed past 11:59 PM ET on October 16, 2024, this market will resolve to 50-50.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from National Hockey League (NHL.com), however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.
